targets.expr: {source="promtail",cluster=~"$cluster",container="kube-apiserver"} |= "delete" |= "authorization.k8s.io/reason" | json | annotations_authorization_k8s_io_reason != "" | annotations_authorization_k8s_io_decision = "allow" | objectRef_name != "" | line_format "❌ {{TrimRight .objectRef_resource \"s\"}} {{.objectRef_name}} DELETED due to authorization from {{.impersonatedUser_username}}{{if contains \"to ServiceAccount\" .annotations_authorization_k8s_io_reason}}Service Account{{end}}{{if contains \"to User.*system:kube\" .annotations_authorization_k8s_io_reason}}Kube System{{end}}"

{source="promtail",cluster=~"$cluster",container="kube-apiserver"} |= "create" |= "authorization.k8s.io/reason" | json | annotations_authorization_k8s_io_reason != "" | annotations_authorization_k8s_io_decision = "allow" | objectRef_name != "" | line_format "✅ {{TrimRight .objectRef_resource \"s\"}} {{.objectRef_name}} CREATED due to authorization from {{.impersonatedUser_username}}{{if contains \"to ServiceAccount\" .annotations_authorization_k8s_io_reason}}Service Account{{end}}{{if contains \"to User.*system:kube\" .annotations_authorization_k8s_io_reason}}Kube System{{end}}"
{job="systemd-journal", cluster=~"$cluster"} |= "segfault" | regexp "(?P<program>\\w+)\\[(?P<pid>[0-9]+)\\].*" | line_format "⚠️ Program \"{{.program}}\" with PID {{.pid}} has ended due to SEGFAULT"

{source="promtail", job="systemd-journal", cluster=~"$cluster"} |= "oom-kill:" | regexp ".*kubepods.burstable.(?P<pod>.+),task_.*task=(?P<task>.+),pid=(?P<pid>[0-9]+).*" | line_format "☠️ Process \"{{.task}}\" with PID {{.pid}} in pod \"{{.pod}}\" was killed by oom-kill"
